description.original: Add and remove tags quickly. Tag search results, bulk tag, and add dedicated buttons/commands for your favorites!
description.translation: Add and remove tags quickly. Tag search results, bulk tag, and add dedicated buttons/commands for your favorites!

dict..setText(\"Starred tags get special trea: .setText("Starred tags get special treatment. Click or hover over these buttons for more details \u{1F449}")
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, only Starred Tag: .setDesc("If disabled, only Starred Tags will be shown in the tag selection dialog.")
dict..setDesc('Helper to replace spaces in in: .setDesc('Helper to replace spaces in input with a preffered tag style. "None" will just remove invalid characters.')
dict.msg = \"This will delete all tags on the: msg = "This will delete all tags on the active note(s), are you sure?"
dict.msg = \"The first toggle on a starred ta: msg = "The first toggle on a starred tag moves it to the top of the list when selecting a tag for your notes."
dict.msg = \"The second toggle on a starred t: msg = "The second toggle on a starred tag adds a command for it so you can create a hotkey, etc."
dict.msg = \"The third toggle on a starred ta: msg = "The third toggle on a starred tag adds a button for it to the status bar."
dict.msg = \"The fourth toggle on a starred t: msg = "The fourth toggle on a starred tag adds it to the context menu."
dict.msg = \"The up arrow button moves the st: msg = "The up arrow button moves the starred tag up on the starred tag list. This affects the order it's displayed in the tag selection dialog."
dict.msg = \"The down arrow button moves the: msg = "The down arrow button moves the starred tag down on the starred tag list. This affects the order it's displayed in the tag selection dialog."
dict.msg = \"The trash can button removes the: msg = "The trash can button removes the starred tag from the starred list."
dict..Notice(\"ERROR: No recent tag, please a: .Notice("ERROR: No recent tag, please assign a tag with Quick Tagger before using this command"
dict.tofrom = mode == \"add\" ? \" added to \: tofrom = mode == "add" ? " added to " : " removed from ";
